name: Microsoft Clip Organizer Media Catalog
summary: Learn about .MGC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Microsoft Clip Organizer was available with Microsoft Office XP to Office 2010. The tool helped users organize, manage, and access media files, such as clip art, photos, videos, and sounds. Additionally, Clip Organizer allowed users to share media collections with others through the export and import of MGC media catalog files, enabling consistent use of media across teams or projects.

description: An MGC file is a media catalog used by Microsoft Clip Organizer, a tool included with older versions of Microsoft Office. It stores a collection of clip art, images, and media resources to organize and manage media assets that users can access and insert into Office documents or presentations. MGC files are obscure since Microsoft Clip Organizer is not included with modern versions of Office.

instructions: You can open MGC files with older versions (XP to 2010) of Microsoft Office that include the Clip Organizer tool. However, no other programs support them.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .mgc file in MGCSoft Equation Illustrator 2.2
images.caption: MGC file open in MGCSoft Equation Illustrator 2.2
